_source.short_desc: Recruiterflow is designed for simplicity and productivity. The OS you need to run a successful recruiting & staffing agency.
_source.long_desc:
Recruiterflow is a complete operating system staffing & recruiting businesses. Recruiterflow offers integrated ATS, CRM, Email sequences and cutting edge recruiting automation that helps you run and scale your recruiting agency. 
 
1000+ recruiting and staffing businesses all over the world use Recruiterflow to drive better productivity and collaboration resulting in 30% reduction in time to submittal and 15% increase in placements.
_source.pricing_details:
14-day free trial, no credit card required.

Growth - $85/year/user 
Scale - $90/year/user
Enterprise - $96/year/user

Custom enterprise plans are also available.

Discounts are available for annual payments.
_source.target_audience: Recruiterflow is an operating system for staffing & recruiting agencies - comprising of applicant tracking, recruiting CRM, email sequences & recruiting automation - everything you need to grow!

media.caption: Generate more recruiting and sales leads using super-personalized email sequences
Source candidates and clients across the web using the chrome extension
Intuitive candidate and contacts profiles to manage your database and take actions
Be more productive. Automate your recruiting activities using Recipes!
Get a bird's eye view of all jobs and dive deeper in your pipelines.

related_products.short_desc: With ZipRecruiter?s smart matching technology, your recruiting agency can reach great candidates and invite them to apply to your job.
related_products.features: ZipRecruiter is rated #1 by employers in the U.S., based on Trustpilot rating of hiring sites with over 1,000 reviews. With ZipRecruiter, your recruiting agency can reach great candidates. Our powerful matching technology scans thousands of resumes to find people with the right experience and actively invites them to apply to your job. The dashboard lets you store and organize candidate information, as well as allowing you to easily contact candidates to set up interviews.

related_products.short_desc: The leading staffing and recruiting solution that empowers over 7,000 agencies to make up to 43% more placements.
related_products.features: Bullhorn is the global leader in software for the staffing and recruiting industry. More than 10,000 staffing companies rely on Bullhorn's cloud-based platform to drive sales, build relationships, and power their staffing processes from start to finish. Headquartered in Boston, with offices around the world, Bullhorn is founder-led and employs more than 950 people globally. To learn more, visit www.bullhorn.com or follow @Bullhorn on Twitter.

related_products.short_desc: Source, engage, and hire. For recruiting agencies, Zoho Recruit bridges the gap between candidate experience and client satisfaction.
related_products.features: Zoho Recruit allows your recruitment agency to organize and track all of its job openings, resumes, candidates, clients, and contacts while also giving you the freedom to create a hiring process that is tailor-made to your business needs. Our robust system scans millions of online profiles and multiple data sources to find candidates who match the skillset and location of your job, and our client portals enable better collaboration with and placements for those you hire for.

related_products.short_desc: Grow your people pipeline, build authentic and long-lasting relationships, and source and hire the right people with LeverTRM.
related_products.features: Lever is a leading Talent Acquisition Suite that makes it easy for talent teams to reach their hiring goals and to connect companies with top talent. Lever is the only platform that provides all talent acquisition leaders with complete ATS and robust CRM capabilities in one product, LeverTRM. Lever supports the hiring needs of over 5,000 companies around the globe including the teams at Netflix, Spotify, Atlassian, KPMG, and Nielsen.

related_products.short_desc: See why Recruiting Agencies love using CEIPAL to identify vacancies, source & screen applicants, & place & digitally onboard new hires!
related_products.features: CEIPAL is the leading ATS for IT & Engineering recruiting firms. Easily manage job requisitions & postings, quickly identify the best candidates using AI keyword matching, conduct interviews, give feedback, onboard selected applicants, & even generate comprehensive reports, all without leaving the platform. Our fully scalable, fully integrated ATS & CRM can help any Recruiting Agency get better value, superior candidates, & more hires.

related_products.short_desc: Applicant tracking software with resume parsing, activity tracking, job order pipeline, email marketing, and social media integration.
related_products.features:
Top Echelon has many recruiting software  features such as resume parsing, email parsing, spreadsheet imports, duplicate checking, merging records, logging activities, customized fields and a Chrome extension to help add profiles from the internet with a click.

The CRM features helps users stay connected to customers such as: email marketing, templates and logging, sales pipelines, hotlists, biz dev, calendar integration, activity planner, social media, job posting, reports and website portal.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based, multi-platform solutions for recruitment, HR sourcing, staffing and RPO with flexibility and power at an affordable price.
related_products.features: PCRecruiter by Main Sequence Technology is a powerful web-based solution for recruitment, HR sourcing, RPO and  staffing. Featuring Outlook integration, mobile access, integrated job posting, candidate screening, virtually unlimited storage, automated resume import, full text searching, VOIP integration, import/export from major 3rd parties, and completely configurable data views. The Main Sequence team has 20 years of service to the recruitment industry and thousands of customers worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, smart and flexible recruiting software built specifically for recruiting agencies and staffing firms. ATS + Recruiting CRM.
related_products.features: Crelate removes the noise with a unified ATS and recruiting CRM, integrated communication tools, and focused assigned team roles. Make informed decisions based on real-time recruiting, sourcing, marketing, and sales metrics. Delight hiring authorities with your ability to respond and adapt quickly. Customize workflows so teams can work how they want. With industry leading data migration and support, your data and time are protected. Leaving you free to grow your business and your network.

related_products.short_desc: Recruiting Software designed for Small Businesses, Staffing Agencies, Executive Search Firms, RPO Firms, Corporate HR.
related_products.features:
Ranked Number 1 and voted the best value hiring software. Recruiting Software designed for Small Businesses, Staffing Agencies, Executive Search Firms, RPO Firms, Corporate HR.
Get Award winning customer support based in the U.S.

related_products.short_desc: On-demand access to active, top-tier tech talent with insights and hands-on help to close more candidates.
related_products.features: By combining both our technology and human touch, Hired demystifies the tech recruiting process - matching top tech talent with compelling opportunities at the world's most innovative companies. Using Hired, both candidates and employers have transparency into the process. This level of insight is unmatched, making the recruiting process quicker and more efficient than ever before. Hired is committed to providing opportunities to diverse talent groups and removing unconscious bias when hiring.

related_products.short_desc: Recruit CRM is a cloud-based software that helps recruitment and staffing firms manage all their work on one simple platform.
related_products.features:
Recruitment Agencies across 75+ countries trust Recruit CRM. 

Recruit CRM is an end-to-end ATS + CRM system designed for recruitment & executive search businesses. Manage candidates, clients, contacts, email, phone calls & post jobs to your website. We also have a powerful AI resume parser that can even parse resumes directly from your emails. 

A straightforward kanban view for both sales & recruitment, email triggers & boolean search makes Recruit CRM the absolute best option for agencies.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, smart and flexible recruiting software built specifically for recruiting agencies and staffing firms. ATS + Recruiting CRM.
similar_products.features: Crelate removes the noise with a unified ATS and recruiting CRM, integrated communication tools, and focused assigned team roles. Make informed decisions based on real-time recruiting, sourcing, marketing, and sales metrics. Delight hiring authorities with your ability to respond and adapt quickly. Customize workflows so teams can work how they want. With industry leading data migration and support, your data and time are protected. Leaving you free to grow your business and your network.

similar_products.short_desc: See why Recruiting Agencies love using CEIPAL to identify vacancies, source & screen applicants, & place & digitally onboard new hires!
similar_products.features: CEIPAL is the leading ATS for IT & Engineering recruiting firms. Easily manage job requisitions & postings, quickly identify the best candidates using AI keyword matching, conduct interviews, give feedback, onboard selected applicants, & even generate comprehensive reports, all without leaving the platform. Our fully scalable, fully integrated ATS & CRM can help any Recruiting Agency get better value, superior candidates, & more hires.

similar_products.short_desc: WizeHire will help you hire great people consistently using professional templates, easy-to-use software and expert hiring coaches!
similar_products.features: WizeHire helps you create quality job ads using job ad templates and hiring coaches to attract more quality candidates. We post your ad to 60+ job boards and then help you assess candidates in one online dashboard with resumes and personality fit reports to find the right fit to grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: JobAdders Intuitive, Cloud Based System Gives Your Recruitment Agency A Competitive Edge. Find And Place The Right Candidates fast.
similar_products.features: **Recruitment Software** Built for Recruitment Agencies and In-House Teams - all jobs, candidates, communication and tasks are streamlined through JobAdders user-friendly, customisable dashboard. JobAdder is an entirely cloud-based system, giving the modern user total flexibility to recruit on the go from any mobile device. JobAdders diverse job posting functionality allows the recruiter to post job ads to over 200 job boards and social media platforms

similar_products.features:
Recruitment Agencies across 75+ countries trust Recruit CRM. 

Recruit CRM is an end-to-end ATS + CRM system designed for recruitment & executive search businesses. Manage candidates, clients, contacts, email, phone calls & post jobs to your website. We also have a powerful AI resume parser that can even parse resumes directly from your emails. 

A straightforward kanban view for both sales & recruitment, email triggers & boolean search makes Recruit CRM the absolute best option for agencies.

similar_products.short_desc: The staffing and recruiting industrys most comprehensive end-to-end software solution.
similar_products.features: Avionte is a leader in enterprise staffing and recruiting software, offering a full suite of innovative end-to-end staffing solutions throughout the U.S. and Canada. Avionte provides a robust platform that includes CRM, recruiting, onboarding, payroll, billing and business intelligence complemented by an ecosystem of strategic technology partners to permit customized solutions tailored to the needs of clerical, light industrial, IT, professional and healthcare staffing firms.

similar_products.short_desc: Applicant tracking software that enables agencies to transform their recruitment, place top talent and better manage their clients.
similar_products.features: Manatal is the next generation of recruitment software, built with the latest technologies and designed to streamline recruitment processes from sourcing to onboarding. Place faster and funnel your recruitment channels into one intuitive platform. Manage your current and future clients with our CRM feature. Leverage the social media enrichment and AI features, improve collaboration, access a full reporting suite and much more. Transform the way you recruit with Manatal's cloud-based hiring tool.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based, multi-platform solutions for recruitment, HR sourcing, staffing and RPO with flexibility and power at an affordable price.
similar_products.features: PCRecruiter by Main Sequence Technology is a powerful web-based solution for recruitment, HR sourcing, RPO and  staffing. Featuring Outlook integration, mobile access, integrated job posting, candidate screening, virtually unlimited storage, automated resume import, full text searching, VOIP integration, import/export from major 3rd parties, and completely configurable data views. The Main Sequence team has 20 years of service to the recruitment industry and thousands of customers worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: CRM and assignment management for executive search firms.
similar_products.features:
Ezekia offers a full CRM for retained executive search firms which includes task management and calendar managements that integrate with Outlook. Billing and Opportunities  Management with weighted projected income.  The Assignment Management includes a database, client portal, customizable reports, customizable fields and more.
Most areas including reporting, allow customization to the specific needs of each firm.

similar_products.short_desc: Staffing agencies use Gem to work more efficiently, grow their database, and make more placements.
similar_products.features:
Gem amplifies staffing recruiters' workflows so they can get back to doing what they love, which is building lasting relationships with clients and placing candidates faster.

When staffing recruiters use Gem, they are able to:
- Find and engage high-quality talent faster than their competitors
- Automate and scale their candidate engagement workflow
- Manage candidate pipepline with ease
- Make informed business decisions with greater strategic insights

similar_products.short_desc: Fetcher's full-service, recruiting automation software brings qualified, interested candidates directly to your inbox - fast!
similar_products.features: Level up your recruiting efforts with Fetcher. The full-service, recruiting automation software empowers teams of all sizes by bringing qualified, interested candidates directly to their inboxes - fast. Our AI-powered platform learns your company's candidate preferences & then identifies top talent for you. Send automated email outreach campaigns to keep candidates engaged through the hiring funnel. Now through 9/30, get 1 month free when you purchase a Fetcher Premium annual subscription.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Job Board software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Job Board tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Job Board software helps companies advertise open positions internally and externally. It can be offered as a stand alone application or be integrated with existing company website. The recent trend in Job Board software is to integrate with social networks for social hiring. Typical features of this software include applicant tracking, email integration, and search tools that help match candidates with appropriate positions. For related software solutions see Applicant Tracking software and Recruiting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Staffing Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Staffing Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Staffing Agency software is used by agencies that provide on-demand and temporary workers to companies. Common functionality includes candidate management, position posting, and employee scheduling.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Video Interviewing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Video Interviewing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Video interviewing software speeds up and simplifies recruiting by eliminating the need for multiple in-person interviews.
